messages.subject: New blog
messages.msgSnippet: Hey all.... I ve been reading the unschooling blogs from other unschoolers and I m really enjoying it.  I though I d start my own so others can read typical
messages.messageBody:
Hey all....

I've been reading the unschooling blogs from other unschoolers and I'm really enjoying it. I though I'd start my own so others can read "typical days" and such.

You can find ours at: http://learningbitsandpieces.blogspot.com/ Ours isn't part of the unschooling webring yet because you have to have one for awhile before you can join, but I hope to join later.

Maybe you guys want to start your own too! I like journaling anyway. Its fun to look back and see what you've been up to. And its very affirming too.

Kristen

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
